Text: International Coalition for ITMr Lay Re International Coalition for IT Central Chapter st Meeting Board room Hilton Hotel Munich City Monday th Oct As you may aware the international community namely G World Bank UN WTO etc is currently working towards assisting the developing countries in bridging the existing digitaldivide In catalysing and also making these efforts more penetrative there is an urgent necessity for a combined practical but localised initiative that will directly encourage and enable the full participation of the stakeholders within these countries in the ne w economy In this way we are planning to setup a companyled initiative in the name of International Coalition for IT starting with Africa The proposed coalition is a special strategy for bridging digitaldivide with developing countries on one hand and on the other hand it is another way for the participating companies to gain competitive edge in these emerging markets and also to strengthen them towards working with the international communit y as well as the governments and notable stakeholders in these developing countries on IT matters The first meeting of the central chapter of this initiative will be coming up soon in Germany Among others this important meeting is expected to produc e the ICOIT Implementation Strategies through the integration of perspectives of the participating companies being companyled initiative It is intende d that these implementation strategies will be applied globally by way of adaptation from one continent to another as the initiative grows Given your Broadband Services perhaps Enron would like to participate in this initiative and may be you would also like your perspective to be a par t of these fundamental strategies In this connection it is my pleasure inviting your company to this meeting In case you are interested kindly l et me know at your earliest convenience so as to facilitate our arrangements I am attaching the concept of the initiative and the meetings tentative agenda for your information In case you have any question please feel fre e to contact me Best regards O Adesioye TTA PresidentCEO TTA TTA is a unique corporation for transferring technologies and knowhow to developing countries through high level initiatives and active participation It is the first of its kind in Europe and perhaps worldwid e International Coalition for IT in Africadoc Tentative Agendast Meetingdoc
